name: SKP
description:
Technology has advanced much further than that of today’s world with science being at the forefront. A mysterious organization is trying to create the ultimate lifeform only to find out that they can’t control it. Realizing what they’ve created, guards flood the laboratory to stop the newly escaped being. The only problem is that they are now on the receiving end of their creation and its powerful abilities. The escapee now has to work their way through guards to go from room to room, dispatching anything between them and the door out.

This game was made for a Miami University Capstone project. The game was created by Programmer, Charlie Trotman, Co-Artist Colin Blaine, and Co-Artist Zack Christerson.

Come talk to us on Twitter if you have any questions or comments!

https://twitter.com/skplabs

Music: "The Lift" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
